article.author: Avalon Waterways®
article.title: More in View. More to Do. Avalon Waterways®
article.lead: Beyond Avalon’s wall-to-wall, floor-to-ceiling windows is a world waiting to be explored – your way.
article.body: Whether you want to enjoy a guided walking tour of one of Europe’s great cities, join a cooking class or paddle a canoe, the Avalon Choice® selections of Classic, Discovery and Active excursions offer a wide range of possibilities.
